MEDprofiles.src.semi_front.BinFigure.set_classes_dict_in_compact_format(classes_attributes_dict)

Set classes_attributes_dict classes in compact format.

Parameters:

classes_attributes_dict – A dictionary associating classes to a tuple containing the lis of the attributes we want to display and the format that may be “compact” or “complete”.

Returns:
